title: Ep. 81 - Al Jackson
description:
On today's show, hilarious friend of the show @aljackson, sits in on the episode so people can learn why we love him so much.  Al co-hosts The Daily Blast Live as well as the weekly podcast "Al & Frank Try To Be Serious" with Frank Caliendo.  The boys took an 80 minute look into Al's life as he shared some incredible stories from standup comedy, acting, and his world away from stage and screen. As always, the guys each pick a song for Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. It's a good one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeshow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and @aljackson
